Value.Name: Calling BS
Value.Description: If this unit has more than 1HP, can survive any attack with 1HP left.

Value.Name: Dash
Value.Description: Command: Give up other actions to move again.

Value.Name: Vantage
Value.Description: Eliza is deadly, cunning, and ready to preempt any move you make. (Always strikes first)

Value.Name: Faith
Value.Description: Years of piety and reverence have made the priest's soul pure. (Increase staff healing power by 5 HP per tier)

Value.Name: Dodge +10
Value.Description: The most coveted art is the ability to outwit the fates themselves. (Grants Dodge +10)

Value.Name: Critical +5
Value.Description: Expertise in dealing killing blows requires dedicated training. (Grants Crit +5)

Value.Name: Critical +10
Value.Description: Expertise in dealing killing blows requires dedicated training. (Grants Crit +10)

Value.Name: Critical + 15
Value.Description: Expertise in dealing killing blows requires dedicated training. (Grants Crit +15)

Value.Name: Canto
Value.Description: A well-trained rider can perform many tasks mid-gallop. (Can use leftover move after most actions)

Value.Name: Savior
Value.Description: Fighting on another’s behalf is second nature to the heroic. (No penalties from rescuing, allows Cover)

Value.Name: Focus
Value.Description: Steady footing can make all the difference in a clash. (Pow/Def +2 when moving one tile or less)

Value.Name: Floaties
Value.Description: Can traverse water. Cliffs, not so much.

Value.Name: Climb
Value.Description: One needs both agility and power in order to scale sheer rock. (Can traverse mountains)

Value.Name: Pathfinding
Value.Description: Rather than face a foe head-on, a nomad can take to better ground. (Lower movement costs in rough terrain)

Value.Name: Siege Training
Value.Description: It takes more than a common mind to tame the machine. (Allows Ballista operation)

Value.Name: Knife
Value.Description: Short, easy to conceal throwing blades that favor finesse and utility over power. (Swords: Skl boosts Str, Mgt -3, Hit +10)

Value.Name: Crossbow
Value.Description: A mechanical bow doesn't need a strong wielder - it helps, however. (Bows: Mgt multiplied, Str instead gives AS)

Value.Name: Steal
Value.Description: If you're faster than an enemy, you can steal from them. Steal rate influenced by level difference and item value; Nubby enemies or steel weapons are easy to steal, but strong enemies or brave weapons may be impossible.

Value.Name: Thieving
Value.Description: tbh this skill doesn't seem to do anything but i didn't wanna remove it just in case, ya know?

Value.Name: Pick
Value.Description: Security mechanisms and thieves have long been in an arms race. (Open doors and chests)

Value.Name: Nihil
Value.Description: A challenge that cuts to the soul: dare you face me in a fair fight? (Nullifies enemy skills, canceled by Nihil)

Value.Name: Plentitude
Value.Description: Restores HP equal to half damage dealt.

Value.Name: Flight
Value.Description: Grants Canto, and Mov +2 unless rescuing.

Value.Name: Anticipation
Value.Description: Auto-equip preferred weapon when attacked.

Value.Name: Siege Mastery
Value.Description: True mastery of the siegecrafts takes sacrifice, talent, and vision. (Ballista operation, +5Mgt with ballistae)

Value.Name: Sacrifice
Value.Description: All true knights aspire to martyrdom; a meaningful death for the good of others. (Heal another, sacrificing up to Lck x2 HP)

Value.Name: Silent Movement
Value.Description: Can pass through enemies.

Value.Name: Longbow
Value.Description: Secret techniques and modifications allow for firing over great distances. (Grants Range +1 for Bows)

Value.Name: Luna
Value.Description: Command (Skl): Use the enemy's might against them, like moon reflecting sun. (Doubles Mgt, halves enemy Def)

Value.Name: Swoop
Value.Description: Dracoknights can dive in at breakneck speeds, and disengage just as swiftly. (Initiate a melee attack within 3 range)

Value.Name: Colossus
Value.Description: It's a universal rule: might makes right; the more might, the better. (Con - enemy Con added to Atk, max 5)

Value.Name: Rage
Value.Description: The only place a berserker finds peace is in the clamor of battle. (Hit and Avoid boosted by Crit rate)

Value.Name: Veteran
Value.Description: An experienced fighter knows to make do with what he has on hand. (Bonus Weapon Masteries, Double WExp)

Value.Name: Attack Canto
Value.Description: Can use leftover move after attacking

Value.Name: Sol
Value.Description: Command (Lck x2): Holy fervor renews strength, like the warmth of the sun. (Recovers HP equal to damage done)

Value.Name: Sharp
Value.Description: Move through an enemy while attacking

Value.Name: Kamaitachi
Value.Description: Knights such as this possess the might to deal death from afar with any weapon. (Allow attacking at 2 range with Hit -20)

Value.Name: Bread Strike
Value.Description: Command (Skl + Spd): Retreat skyward to set up a devastating dive attack. (Grants Mgt/Crt +8, nonflying targets only)

Value.Name: Renewal
Value.Description: Restores 5 HP on turn start.

Value.Name: Smite
Value.Description: The old scriptures preach of wrath and justice, and the end of evil. (Mgt and WTA bonus doubled vs Dark)

Value.Name: Academic
Value.Description: A scholar for life, with few secrets left to learn. (Bonus Weapon Masteries, Double WExp)

Value.Name: Entropic Shield
Value.Description: A field of chaotic magic surrounds the mage, keeping them safe. (Grants Avoid +25 vs physical weapons)

Value.Name: Celerity
Value.Description: On a thin line between strength and frailty, agility makes its home. (Grants Mov + 2)

Value.Name: Dreaded
Value.Description: Morale cannot hold against one so subsumed in darkness. (Enemy Hit/Crit -10 within 3 tiles)

Value.Name: Nova
Value.Description: Command (Res): Channel the fury of the elements, like the rage of a dying star. (Doubles Mgt, halves enemy Res)

Value.Name: Dance
Value.Description: Lets an ally move again. Duh.

Value.Name: Provision
Value.Description: Quick access to bindings and supplies allows allies to return to the fight sooner. (Heals adjacent allies 10 HP each turn)

Value.Name: Machinist
Value.Description: Supporting an army means assembling all manner of war machines and defenses. (Can deploy and maintain siege engines)

Value.Name: Hit +10
Value.Description: A keen eye, a calculating mind, and a thousand hours of training behind every hit. (Grants Hit +10)

Value.Name: Hit +25
Value.Description: A keen eye, a calculating mind, and a thousand hours of training behind every hit. (Grants Hit +25)

Value.Name: Evasiveness
Value.Description: Careful use of blocking, parrying, and rolling keep professional warriors out of harm's way. (Grants Avoid +10 except at WTD)

Value.Name: Pow +3
Value.Description: Power +3

Value.Name: Skl +3
Value.Description: Skill +3

Value.Name: Spd +3
Value.Description: Speed +3

Value.Name: Lck +3
Value.Description: Luck +3

Value.Name: Def +3
Value.Description: Defense +3

Value.Name: Res +3
Value.Description: Resistance +3

Value.Name: Pow +5
Value.Description: Power +5

Value.Name: Skl +5
Value.Description: Skill +5

Value.Name: Spd +5
Value.Description: Speed +5

Value.Name: Disruption
Value.Description: Mastery over the forces of magic and those who command it. (Atk +5 vs Magic except at WTD)

Value.Name: Pow +2
Value.Description: Power +2

Value.Name: Skl +2
Value.Description: Skill +2

Value.Name: Spd +2
Value.Description: Speed +2

Value.Name: Lck +2
Value.Description: Luck +2

Value.Name: Def +2
Value.Description: Defense +2

Value.Name: Res +2
Value.Description: Resistance +2

Value.Name: Con +2
Value.Description: Constitution +2

Value.Name: Renewal
Value.Description: Restores 5 HP on turn start.

Value.Name: Cantoforce
Value.Description: Attacking/using items consumes one movement instead of ending turn. Not refreshed after dancing. (If moverange breaks, just suspend/resume. This was actually really hard to code...)

Value.Name: Preventing BS
Value.Description: In combat with this unit, hit rates below 20 (10 for crit) become 0. Above 80 (40 for crit) become 100.

Value.Name: (NYI)Reisenskill
Value.Description: idk yo something.

Value.Name: Stealth
Value.Description: Invisibility lets this unit freely pass by enemies.

Value.Name: Juggernaut
Value.Description: Takes half damage from all attacks. Cannot dodge.

Value.Name: Mostly Lazy
Value.Description: Unless an enemy is within 5 spaces, can only move one space.

Value.Name: Inspiration
Value.Description: Allies within 2 spaces gain +4 pow/def/res.

Value.Name: Yuri's Poise
Value.Description: Adjacent allies receive +2 pow and +6 def/res. Bonus +2pow/def/res to girls who like girls.

Value.Name: On A Roll
Value.Description: When initiating combat, gain two stacks of +2 pow/spd. Lose one stack at the start of each player phase. (Only gain stacks if using Metal Claw)

Value.Name: (NYI)Special Dance
Value.Description: After dancing for an ally, they gain +2 pow/def/res.

Value.Name: Delivery!
Value.Description: Weighed down by deliveries. Acts as if carrying a unit.

Value.Name: Annoying
Value.Description: Adjacent units suffer -7 all stats except HP.

Value.Name: Phantasm
Value.Description: Can walk through walls.

Value.Name: Immortal
Value.Description: Cannot be damaged.

Value.Name: Pacifist
Value.Description: Cannot attack

Value.Name: ...Mostly
Value.Description: ...Unless this unit can deal at least 1000x an enemy's max HP in damage.

Value.Name: Tenacious
Value.Description: When at half HP or less, gains avoid equal to missing HP.

Value.Name: Duplication
Value.Description: Creates a clone of the user with set stats. Clones share HP, status, and inventory. May move unpredictably after spawning.

Value.Name: Ziti Strike
Value.Description: After 10 rounds of combat, become able to unleash an attack with 2x weapon might and 100% crit rate.

Value.Name: Pierce
Value.Description: blop

Value.Name: Treasure-Hungry
Value.Description: Intense thirst for treasure lets this unit shrug off attacks until their greed overcomes... idk whatever big def boost that drops over time. also reduces the effect of poison and negates defense-piercing effects

Value.Name: Adept
Value.Description: (Speed/2) chance for an attack to hit twice. Instead of critical hits, weapon crit adds to activation chance.

Value.Name: Stavethrift
Value.Description: Can use staves without lowering durability.

Value.Name: Dark Angel
Value.Description: After 5 turns, able to become a Fallen Angel for 3 turns: +8 to all stats, don't consume tome uses, and can fly, but can't use staves and gain much less EXP.

Value.Name: mai preshush
Value.Description: easy there smeagol

Value.Name: Selfless
Value.Description: Can rescue allies regardless of Con stat.

Value.Name: Immortal-ish
Value.Description: 50% chance to take no damage from any attack.

Value.Name: Lunar Arms
Value.Description: Is a user of special mind-based attacks. And ordinary, everyday staves.

Value.Name: Room to Grow
Value.Description: Boosts every stat except HP by this unit's level.

Value.Name: Charisma
Value.Description: buffs allies doop

Value.Name: Pow +10
Value.Description: Power +10

Value.Name: Skl +10
Value.Description: Skill +10

Value.Name: Res +10
Value.Description: Resistance +10

Value.Name: Def +20
Value.Description: Defense +20

Value.Name: Hidden
Value.Description: Few enemies would even think to attack units they can't see.

Value.Name: Recover
Value.Description: Restores all HP on turn start.

Value.Name: Dragonskin+
Value.Description: Take half damage from all attacks. Critical hits against this unit deal 2x damage instead of 3x. Also immune to status ailments.

Value.Name: Rightful Marc
Value.Description: Activation skills apply passively.

Value.Name: Pavaegis
Value.Description: (Def/Res depending on opponent's weapon)% chance to take half damage.

Value.Name: Bucatini Strike
Value.Description: If this unit would deal less than their level in damage, (Unit's level)% chance to deal their level in damage. AKA, 20% chance to deal 20 damage, if display damage is less than 20.

Value.Name: Developer's Foresight
Value.Description: Can only use Prf weapons.

Value.Name: Defiance
Value.Description: Half of damage taken added to damage dealt.

Value.Name: Confusion
Value.Description: Units who enter combat with this unit will have 0 accuracy for the next 3 turns.

Value.Name: Immunity
Value.Description: Immune to status effects.

Value.Name: Shielding
Value.Description: This unit is able to operate the shield room. While inside, boss Marcs have +50 def/res. Also, this unit must be killed at 1 or 2 range.

Value.Name: Link Shield
Value.Description: This unit has +50 def/res while GrimaJoe is operating the shield room.

Value.Name: Sure Shot+
Value.Description: User has 100% accuracy and 2x weapon mgt, and ignores half of foe's def/res.

Value.Name: Vandalized
Value.Description: ono u got hit by vandal you have -3 spd and -1def/res

Value.Name: Vandetta
Value.Description: gives permanent crit bonus when hit

Value.Name: Edgy Loner
Value.Description: Unit has a +4 buff to all stats that decreases by 2 for each ally in 2 spaces (Can't go negative)

Value.Name: Speed Metal
Value.Description: Both combatants have 100% accuracy.

Value.Name: Obstruct
Value.Description: Enemies cannot pass through this unit, even with Stealth.

Value.Name: Voice of Experience
Value.Description: Adjacent allies gain 1.5x exp from battle.

Value.Name: Dark Angle
Value.Description: +8 all stats if unit's HP is less than 10% Max HP.

Value.Name: Hiatus
Value.Description: Command: Become immobile but invincible until command is used again. Cannot use while rescuing.

Value.Name: Charitable Return
Value.Description: Gain +1 to all stats for each ally in 2 spaces.

Value.Name: Reliable Fighter
Value.Description: Always has WTA.

Value.Name: Deadly Reach
Value.Description: All axes can be thrown.

Value.Name: Cheese Grater
Value.Description: Unit is immune to attacks from further than 3 range.

Value.Name: Dimensional Dissonance
Value.Description: Effective (2x tome might) against human enemies.

Value.Name: Horsie!
Value.Description: Command: Mount or dismount. Mounted: 8 move with Canto+. Unmounted: 6 move with Stavethrift.

Value.Name: Bootleg Astra
Value.Description: (Speed / 2)% chance to deal 4.5x damage. When activated, crits deal 2x (9x total)
